# KDE job to run multiple profiles, scorecards and/or mappings
# Check the sample job for comments on the key words and structure of job definition files
# @Since: 09-NOV-2016
# @Version: 20161109.0  #- Initial version
# @Author: Jac. Beekers
#
# Note: The following structure will also work in FitNesse. Therefore, the first line starts with Table:
!|Table:Job Definition                                                                                                                                                                                                                 |
|KDE|KDE Example Job        |Version=20161113.1|OnlyGenerate=Yes|Persistence=Yes|Max Concurrent=2               |IDQConfig=/rabo/sserole/tws/config/idq.cfg|PWCConfig=/rabo/sserole/tws/config/pwc_idq.cfg                                             |
|Steps                                                                                                                                                                                                                                |
|10 |Run Profile NPSBLKDE   |Run IDQ           |profile        |project=KDE_5_Profile_Scorecard|object=Profile_NP_SBL_KDE                 |result=OK                                     |On Error=CONTINUE|Wait=No                   |
|3  |Run OBA mapping        |Run IDQ           |mapping        |project=OBA_4_Mappings         |application=Appl_run_map_OBA_Adressen     |mapping=map_OBA_select_adresses_based_on_rules|result=OK        |On Error=STOP    |Wait=No |
|40 |Run Scorecard          |Run IDQ           |scorecard      |project=KDE_5_Profile_Scorecard|object=sc_DWHD_KeyDataElementen           |result=OK                                     |On Error=CONTINUE|                           |
|20 |Run SBLEmail scorecard |Run IDQ           |profile        |project=KDE_5_Profile_Scorecard|object=Profile_SBL_Email                  |result=OK                                     |On Error=CONTINUE|Wait=No                   |
|24 |Run workflows IDQ      |Run IDQ           |workflow       |project=DWHD_4_Mappings        |application=Appl_DWHD_LoadHistory         |object=wf_Load_Profile_Star                   |result=OK        |On Error=CONTINUE|Wait=Yes|
|17 |Run Power Center stuff |Run PWC           |workflow       |folder=Demo                    |object=wf_Customers                       |result=OK                                     |Wait=Yes                                    |
|40 |This is an invalid step|Invalid           |output         |connection=SHDemo              |sqlfile=cnt_customers.sql                 |result=55000                                                                               |
|50 |Run an Oracle SQL      |Run Oracle        |output         |connection=SHDemo              |sqlfile=cnt_customers.sql                 |result=55000                                                                               |
